name: I - Poem of Swords and Spears

system.description:
You sing a gallant song of battles won, aggravating those that hear you.

Spend 1 Beat to give all allies in burst 2 +1d to their next attack, and then taunt all enemies in the burst until the end of their next riff, and all haze tiles in the burst suffer the strong wind of your song.

Tandava Blades: Spend 2 Beats. All enemies taunted by this are slowed.

Sword Glossolalia: Spend 3 Beats to incant mystick songs: slide 3 each enemy in the burst and then dazzle them.
system.flavor: A flamboyant Sword Poet, Si Pahimuot, once performed this amidst the kawal of Datu Mabigi, from the league of Pannai, who hunted him down due to him killing his bride.
